I will give you the best applications for your best ideas.

An activity program from Kampus Merdeka called Magang Studi Independen Bersertifikat in Collaboration with Hacktiv8. Participants are expected to be able to create a website based on a javascript framework and create a complex mobile application in the form of Android / iOS. Graduates of this program are expected to have the ability to work as Front End Developers and/or Mobile Apps
